s.text: I will be waiting for your mail as soon as possible .

Date: Thu, 3 Feb 2011 03:55:24 -0800 (PST) From: priscilla william <priscillawilliam28@att.net> Reply-To: priscillawilliam26@yahoo.com Subject: Hello To: undisclosed recipients: ;

I believe that color , religion , language , age , country , tribe , distance etc has nothing to do with real friendship , i believe real friendship is all about love , care , trust etc for each other .
